---

## GAD-7 vs ERI

Comparing questionnaires like *GAD-7 vs ERI* can be challenging, time-consuming, and exhausting for researchers and psychologists. This is where Harmony, a groundbreaking software, steps in to make the process easier and faster. Measuring or assessing the severity of generalized anxiety disorder (GAD) with GAD-7, and evaluating unbalanced effort and reward at work using ERI (Effort-Reward Imbalance Questionnaire), involves intricate understanding and subjective interpretations. Harmony brings efficiency and precision to these processes through the use of natural language processing and generative AI models. Harmonization between *GAD-7 vs ERI* can be easily achieved with Harmony. For instance, an item from ERI such as "If I postpone something that I was supposed to do today, I'll have trouble sleeping at night" can be compared to the GAD-7 item "Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge". Harmony's advanced AI model provides a percentage match between these two items, aiding in the subjective interpretation of correlation. Harmony's large database allows researchers to select from ready instruments or simply upload their own questionnaires in a user-friendly web interface, thereby expanding the scope of harmonisation across multiple languages. The implementation of Harmony in Psychology and Social Science research brings a revolution in the comparative analysis of *GAD-7 vs ERI* among other questionnaires. This, in turn, allows for greater cross-study evaluation and consistency checks, contributing to thorough and effective research. Harmony aims to streamline the harmonisation process, thus saving time and improving the accuracy of results. With this modern tool, *GAD-7 vs ERI* comparison becomes a click away, ushering in a new era of efficient research!

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and ERI

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and ERI into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just ERI into Harmony</a> - compare ERI with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
